name: Battery's Link
description:
Battery's Link is a 2D Puzzle-Platformer game

You'll need to supply energy for making progress with a small robot.

Done for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 ! This is my 3rd GameJam. I didn't had much time so that explain the lack of levels.

Controls :

  • A - D : Horizontal move
  • SPACEBAR : Jump
  • E : Interact

Ressources used :

WOWIE Asset Pack : https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

The ThaleahFat Font : https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah
